name: Custard Pie
author: Shirley Drury, Annita Layton
instructions: Beat eggs slightly with rotary beater. Then beat in sugar, salt, nutmeg, milk and vanilla. Pour into pastry lined pie pan. Bake just until a silver knife inserted into side of filling comes out clean. The center may still look a bit soft, but will set later. Bake at 450° for 15 minutes, then 350° for 25 to 30 minutes.
